summary: This is a certification of business records from FedEx Express, signed by Tracey L. Ferrara as Custodian of Records, verifying that certain documents are original or true copies made in the regular course of business. The document is notarized by A.W. and appears to be part of legal proceedings, likely related to the production of shipping or financial records in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Tracey L. Ferrara
persons.role: Custodian of Records for FedEx Express Legal Department
persons.context: Employee of FedEx Express who certifies that the documents are original records or true copies made in the regular course of business.

persons.name: A.W.
persons.context: Notary public who witnessed the signing of the certification document.

events.title: Execution of FedEx Business Records Certification
events.description: Tracey L. Ferrara signs a certification verifying that certain FedEx Express documents are original or true copies made in the regular course of business, and the document is notarized by A.W.

locations: FedEx Express Legal Department, 3620 Hacks Cross Road Building B, Third Floor, Memphis, TN 38125
keyFacts: Tracey L. Ferrara, as Custodian of Records for FedEx Express, certified that certain documents are original or true copies made in the regular course of business.
The certification was executed and notarized on February 21, 2008, in Memphis, Tennessee.
This document appears to be part of legal proceedings requiring the authentication of business records, possibly related to shipping or financial transactions in the Epstein case.
